method.text: Arrange the slices of madeira cake around the edge and base of a glass serving dish. Sprinkle the slices with the orange juice.
Mix half of the custard with the plain chocolate in a bowl until smooth and evenly mixed. In another bowl, repeat with the remaining custard and the white chocolate.

Spoon the plain chocolate custard over the madeira cake slices, and leave to set in the fridge for 1hr ? 1hr 30min. Spoon over the white chocolate custard and return to the fridge for a further 1hr ? 1hr 30min, or until set..
Top with the orange pieces, reserving four segments. Sprinkle over the grated milk chocolate.
Place a large star shaped nozzle into a piping bag and pipe swirls of the whipped double cream around the outer edge, and one in the middle of the trifle.
Dip the banana slices into the lemon juice and arrange in between the cream swirls. Decorate with remaining orange segments and flaked almonds.
Sieve over a little cocoa powder just before serving.
